short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a confirmation message when using Login Access to access a Salesforce Production Org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This adds a confirmation message when using Salesforce's Subscriber Login Access (part of the License Management Application) to access a customer's Production orgs. This does not affect Sandbox orgs.
This helps to increase visibility of Production orgs vs. Sandboxes and helps prevent logging into these orgs unintentionally.
